verse: हृदं भोजे कृष्णः सजलजलदश्यामलतनुः सरोजाक्षः स्रग्वी मुकुटकटकाद्याभरणवान् । शरद्राकानाथ प्रतिमवदनः श्री मुरलिकाम् वहन् ध्येयो गोपीगणपरिवृतः कुंकुमचितः ॥

words_meaning.सजलजलदश्यामलतनुः: with a body dark like the monsoon cloud, wet with water
words_meaning.मुकुटकटकाद्याभरणवान्: adorned with a crown, bracelet, and other ornaments
words_meaning.प्रतिमवदनः: with a face like a sculpture
words_meaning.गोपीगणपरिवृतः: surrounded by the group of cowherd maidens

overall_meaning: Krishna, with a body dark like the monsoon cloud and wet with water, lotus-eyed, adorned with a garland, crown, bracelet, and other ornaments, the Lord of the autumn season, with a face like a sculpture, bearing the enchanting flute, holding the object of meditation, surrounded by the group of cowherd maidens, adorned with kumkum.
